title: How to Use a Nintendo DS Soft Card

steps.headline: Use one of the sides of the soft card and gently push the bubbles to the nearest edge.
steps.description: If you're not careful you'll end making more bubbles...you have to repeat this step until all bubbles are gone.

steps.headline: Save the soft card.
steps.description: It is used to remove the screen protector.

steps.headline: Notice that the screen protector has an edge that is thinner than the others.
Gently try to get one of the edges to take off the protector.
steps.description: and slowly try to take more of the screen. when you have enough of the screen protector so that your fingers have a firm grip on. just finish it by using your hands.

text: Steps Apply the screen protector.  Use one of the sides of the soft card and gently push the bubbles to the nearest edge. If you're not careful you'll end making more bubbles...you have to repeat this step until all bubbles are gone. Save the soft card. It is used to remove the screen protector. To Remove Screen Protector Notice that the screen protector has an edge that is thinner than the others.  Gently try to get one of the edges to take off the protector. and slowly try to take more of the screen. when you have enough of the screen protector so that your fingers have a firm grip on. just finish it by using your hands.
